IronExpress.name: IRON EXPRESS
IronExpress.description: Immediately after you play <c=card>the leftmost/ rightmost card in your hand</c>, your cannon slides left/right 1. Immediately after you play <c=card>the middle card in your hand</c>, your cannon rotates and is replaced by an armored shield, giving you 2 <c=status>SHIELD</c>.

IronExpressV2.name: SPIN TO WIN
IronExpressV2.description: While in cannon mode, rotating gives you 1 <c=status>OVERDRIVE</c>. While in shield mode, <c=card>the middle card in your hand</c> costs 1 less.

IronExpressMobius.name: MOBIUS TRACKS
IronExpressMobius.description: Attempting to slide the cannon off the ship now teleports it to the opposite side.

Challenger.name: CHALLENGER
Challenger.description:
Cards played from the <c=card>left side of your hand</c> immediately activate the left fist.
Attacks fired from the left fist push the enemy to the right.
The opposite is true for the right fist.
Attacks from a card in <c=card>the center of your hand</c> activate both.

ChampionBelt.name: FLEXIBLE JOINTS
ChampionBelt.description: If a fist would miss by 1 space, it hits the next part nearest to the center instead.

Sweatband.name: SWEATBAND
Sweatband.description: After taking hull damage, gain 1 <c=status>AUTODODGE RIGHT</c>

HighScore.name: HIGH SCORE
HighScore.description: Playing alternating cards from the <c=card>left and right of your hand</c> gives you a stacking <c=status>HIGH SCORE</c> bonus, that resets when playing 2 cards from the same side in a row.

Ouranos.name: OURANOS RAILGUN
Ouranos.description:
At the end of your turn, gain 1 <c=ffe93b>ELECTRIC CHARGE</c>.
<c=downside>Each turn, any attack card played after the first one will do 0 damage.</c>

Ouranos_V2.name: OURANOS RAILGUN V2
Ouranos_V2.description:
Replaces <c=artifact>OURANOS RAILGUN</c>.
At the end of your turn, gain 1 <c=ffe93b>ELECTRIC CHARGE</c>. Your attacks are stored in your cannon and are fired all at once on turn end. 
<c=downside>Lose 1 </c><c=ffe93b>ELECTRIC CHARGE</c><c=downside> every time an attack is stored.</c>

PowerSurge.name: POWER SURGE
PowerSurge.description: At the start of combat, gain 2 <c=ffe93b>ELECTRIC CHARGE</c>.

LightningDrive.name: LIGHTNING DRIVE
LightningDrive.description: At turn start, if you've got 2 or more <c=ffe93b>ELECTRIC CHARGE</c>, gain 1 <c=status>EVADE</c>.

Asteroid.name: ASTEROID HULL
Asteroid.description:
This ship's starting cards allows ejection of most of its parts.
<c=downside>While a part is ejected, the relevant feature becomes unavailable. (Comms prevents from gaining shield, Engine prevents from moving)</c>

OrbitalRecovery.name: ORBITAL RECOVERY
OrbitalRecovery.description: Draw 2 whenever you recover a tossed part.</c>

MagnetizedParts.name: MAGNETIZED ROCKS
MagnetizedParts.description: The first Toss card you draw each turn gains retain until you play it or combat ends.</c>

Squadron.name: SQUADRON
Squadron.description:
Squad members can be moved individually.
Cards are only played by the relevant pilot, or by the <c=ffe93b>squad leader</c> if the pilot isn't present.
The <c=ffe93b>squad leader</c> is the last pilot to have moved, taken damage, or played a card. 
<c=downside>When a pilot takes damage, they go missing.</c>

EvasiveAction.name: COORDINATED MANOEUVRE
EvasiveAction.description: If you start your turn with no <c=status>EVADE</c>, gain 1.

Squadron4th.name: THE MORE THE MERRIER
Squadron4th.description:
Gain 1 <c=status>ENERGY</c> every turn.
On pickup, adds a random 4th pilot to the squadron, along with their starting cards and artifacts.

EscapePod.name: FRAGILE STRUCTURE
EscapePod.description: <c=downside>Take 1 damage whenever a shot passes through one of your empty parts.

TossPart.name: EJECT PART
TossPart.description: Eject the hilighted part until the next turn for <c=damage>1</c> damage.
TossPart.description2: Eject the hilighted part for 2 turns, dealing <c=damage>2</c> damage.

Ramm.name: RAM
Ramm.description: Ram into the enemy ship, destroying any <c=midrow>midrow object</c> in your path and dealing {0} to every part hit.

Rail.name: Iron Express
Rail.description: A clunky ship featuring a rail mounted cannon, also capable of acting as a shield by rotating on its axis.

Fist.name: Challenger
Fist.description: A young ship that dreams of becoming the greatest boxer of its timeline.

Ouranos.name: Ouranos
Ouranos.description: A nimble warship featuring a powerfull, slow shooting railgun.

Asteroid.name: Shooting Star
Asteroid.description: A ship scrapped together from wrecks and asteroid parts.

Squadron.name: Squadron
Squadron.description: You get a ship, you get a ship, everyone gets a ship!

EscapePod.name: Escape Pod
EscapePod.description:
Good luck? 
<c=downside>Not meant to be balanced, play at your own risk</c>

ElectricCharge.name: ELECTRIC CHARGE
ElectricCharge.description:
Add {0} damage to your next attack card.
<c=downside>Decreases by 1 when hit.</c>

RailgunCharge.name: RAILGUN CHARGE
RailgunCharge.description: Attacks have been loaded into the railgun, and will be release at turn end for {0} damages

Highscore.10: <c=FFDD00>10+</c> Gain an additional card reward choice.
